example_usage:
# Example usage for draw_measurement
result = draw_measurement(data)

educational_standards.description: Measure and estimate liquid volumes using liters (l).
Measure and estimate the masses of objects using standard units of grams (g) and kilograms (kg).
Solve one-step word problems by subtracting quantities of liquid volumes given in the same units.
Solve one-step word problems by multiplying quantities of masses or volumes given in the same units.
Solve word problems involving two step division.
Use the four operations to solve word problems involving liquid volumes, including problems that require expressing measurements given in a larger unit in terms of a smaller unit.
